# [Interview #587: TOM Signing Report - Sarayne, Entry #42](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=587#42)

#### Question

Will there be an overlying plot for the future of
*Mistborn*
?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes, but it may not be immediately obvious.
